Text: Nice torrent, pdfs are fairly good quality. Not my favourite edition ( i'm a 3.5 man myself) but good anyway.

Great torrent! this is the best edition there is. just had to say that. 3 and 3.5 were prone to what me and my gaming friends called basterdisation. 4th edition has made that almost impossible. at least i havent figured out how to cheat by the rules yet:) also, please do buy these books. i own them but want to have it all on my laptop to help pass time at work.
